title: Dream Destination Wedding in Goa – Just ₹25 Lakhs!
description: All-inclusive beach wedding package in Goa with décor, catering, 3-day accommodation for 100 guests, and entertainment. Valid till Aug 2025.

title: Royal Palace Wedding in Jaipur – ₹30 Lakhs Only
description: Get married like royalty! Book a palace in Jaipur for your big day. Package includes décor, traditional Rajasthani menu, folk performances, and stay for 150 guests.

title: FREE Thailand Honeymoon with Your Wedding in Udaipur
description: Book a destination wedding in Udaipur and get a 5-day honeymoon package in Thailand absolutely FREE. Flights + stay included!

title: Shimla Snow Wedding + Maldives Honeymoon Combo
description: Have a magical snowy wedding in Shimla and chill in Maldives post-wedding! Combo package includes full wedding + 4-night honeymoon stay.

title: Neemrana Fort Wedding – Under ₹20 Lakhs
description: Fairytale fort wedding at Neemrana with royal welcome, heritage décor, shehnai live music & 2-night stay. Budget-friendly & stunning!

title: Jim Corbett Jungle Wedding + Safari Treat!
description: Wildly romantic wedding in the lap of nature. Jim Corbett forest wedding package with 2 safari rides, jungle-themed décor & guest stays.
